docs.snippet: One of the most expensive high school football stadiums in the United States has been temporarily shut due to structural problems less than two years after it opened in the Dallas suburb of Allen....
docs.lead_paragraph: One of the most expensive high school football stadiums in the United States has been temporarily shut due to structural problems less than two years after it opened in the Dallas suburb of Allen.

docs.snippet: Former football star Darren Sharper, wanted by New Orleans police as a suspect in two rapes, was arrested on Thursday in Los Angeles, where he pleaded not guilty a week ago to charges of drugging four other women and raping two of them....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former football star Darren Sharper, wanted by New Orleans police as a suspect in two rapes, was arrested on Thursday in Los Angeles, where he pleaded not guilty a week ago to charges of drugging four other women and raping two of them.

headline.main: Ex-NFL Star Arrested in Los Angeles on New Orleans Rape Warrant
headline.print_headline: Ex-NFL Star Arrested in Los Angeles on New Orleans Rape Warrant

docs.snippet: Seventy-six European clubs are under the microscope as UEFA prepares to bring in its financial fair play rules next season, European soccer's governing body said on Friday, adding that offenders would be named in April....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seventy-six European clubs are under the microscope as UEFA prepares to bring in its financial fair play rules next season, European soccer's governing body said on Friday, adding that offenders would be named in April.

headline.print_headline: UEFA to Name Financial Fair Play Offenders in April

docs.snippet: Spain will play their final warm-up game before they head to Brazil to defend their World Cup crown against El Salvador in Washington, D.C. on June 7, the Spanish football federation (RFEF) said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spain will play their final warm-up game before they head to Brazil to defend their World Cup crown against El Salvador in Washington, D.C. on June 7, the Spanish football federation (RFEF) said on Friday.

headline.main: Spain to Play El Salvador in Final World Cup Warm-Up
headline.print_headline: Spain to Play El Salvador in Final World Cup Warm-Up

docs.snippet: Controversial Cardiff City owner Vincent Tan has criticised "a little bit racist" British media for projecting him as a villain and ruled out the possibility of the Premier League club changing its team colours back to blue....
docs.lead_paragraph: Controversial Cardiff City owner Vincent Tan has criticised "a little bit racist" British media for projecting him as a villain and ruled out the possibility of the Premier League club changing its team colours back to blue.

headline.print_headline: Tan Flays 'Racist' Media, Says Cardiff in Safe Hands

docs.snippet: Portugal sprang several surprises when naming their squad on Friday for the midweek friendly with Cameroon, including two uncapped youngsters plus five players who did not take part in the 2014 World Cup qualifiers....
